laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial Hgb 10.9, WBC 6.8, PLT 136; repeat Hgb 9.3, WBC 6.9, PLT 113.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Hgb decreased from 10.9 to 9.3 after 3L IVF; WBC remained stable (6.8 to 6.9); PLT decreased from 136 to 113.

laboratory_examinations.findings: < 10,000 CFU/mL, with few bacteria, negative nitrates, negative leukocytes, and 3 WBC.
Liver diffusely echogenic consistent with steatosis; no focal hepatic mass; normal gallbladder; no biliary ductal dilation; no hydronephrosis.
